option.description: ECH, External Clock, High Power Mode (4-32 MHz): device clock supplied to CLKIN pin
option.name: ECH

option.description: ECM, External Clock, Medium Power Mode (0.5-4 MHz): device clock supplied to CLKIN pin
option.name: ECM

option.description: ECL, External Clock, Low Power Mode (0-0.5 MHz): device clock supplied to CLKIN pin
option.name: ECL

option.description: INTOSC oscillator: I/O function on CLKIN pin
option.name: INTOSC

option.description: WDT enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: WDT enabled while running and disabled in Sleep
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: WDT controlled by the SWDTEN bit in the WDTCON register
option.name: SWDTEN

option.description: WDT disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: PWRT disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: PWRT enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR
option.name: ON

option.description: MCLR/VPP pin function is digital input
option.name: OFF

option.description: Program memory code protection is disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Program memory code protection is enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running and disabled in Sleep
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: Brown-out Reset controlled by the SBOREN bit in the BORCON register
option.name: SBODEN

option.description: Brown-out Reset disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: CLKOUT function is disabled. I/O or oscillator function on the CLKOUT pin
option.name: OFF

option.description: CLKOUT function is enabled on the CLKOUT pin
option.name: ON

option.description: Write protection off
option.name: OFF

option.description: 000h to 1FFh write protected, 200h to 7FFh may be modified by PMCON control
option.name: BOOT

option.description: 000h to 3FFh write protected, 400h to 7FFh may be modified by PMCON control
option.name: HALF

option.description: 000h to 7FFh write protected, no addresses may be modified by PMCON control
option.name: ALL

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will cause a Reset
option.name: ON

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will not cause a Reset
option.name: OFF

option.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (Vbor), low trip point selected.
option.name: LO

option.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (Vbor), high trip point selected.
option.name: HI

option.description: Low-Power BOR is disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Low-Power BOR is enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Low-voltage programming enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: High-voltage on MCLR/VPP must be used for programming
option.name: OFF
